title: ASIC-Resistant in Crypto Mining
description: ASIC-Resistant networks are those which it is difficult to deploy Application-Specific Integrated Circuits (ASICs) to mine.

title: Scrypt Crypto Mining Algorithm
description: Scrypt is a password-based essential derivation function and a proof-of-work consensus hash function used for mining certain cryptocurrencies. It is another secure alternative to SHA-256 used by Bitcoin and has been widely adopted by leading blockchains, mainly Litecoin. The algorithm allows miners to contribute work for a chance to confirm a block of transactions and receive rewards.

title: Ethereum Layer-2 Solution: Raiden Network
description: The Raiden Network is a layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum that adopts the same principles as Bitcoin’s Lightning Network. The Offchain scaling solution is designed to enable fast, low-fee, and immediate payments using Ethereum’s ERC-20 tokens.
